Uses of Class
game.user.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    game.user
    Package to include the Player class, which defines individual players, check if each player move is valid, add them to the game board and verify when a player wins.

    • Uses of Player in game.user

      Methods in game.user with parameters of type Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Player.set_coords(HexBoard hb, Player other_player)
      Function to read from the screen the next move for current player.
      boolean Player.valid_move(CoordBoard move, Player other_player)
      Check if the new move is valid (not played before for any player)
